English: In the morning, near enemy positions
BAZA TO ALL UNITS, BE ADVISED THE EASTERN DECOY ATTACK IS UNDERWAY. CENTRAL UNITS SHOULD GET READY, THE MAIN OFFENSIVE WILL START SOON. GOOD LUCK TO EASTERN UNITS. BAZA OUT.
ANTON TO FYODOR, THE FARM IS SECURED. SEND IN THE APCS!
ANTON TO BAZA, ANTON AND BORIS ON THE WAY TO ENTRE DEUX, LEONID TO ATTACK COASTAL BASE. OUT.
BAZA TO THE CENTRAL FRONT, COMMENCE THE ATTACK ON MONTIGNAC. GOOD LUCK, MEN. BAZA OUT.
DISMOUNT HERE. WE'LL SUPPORT YOU IN TAKING THE FORTIFIED HILL. THEN WE CONTINUE TO THE VILLAGE.
THE HILL IS UNDER OUR CONTROL. THE VILLAGE SHOULDN'T BE A PROBLEM. LET'S GO.

BAZA TO ALL UNITS. CHANGE OF PLANS. RETREAT IMMEDIATELY TO THE NEAREST BASE AND PREPARE FOR EVACUATION IN SAINT PIERRE. A GENERAL RETREAT HAS BEEN DECLARED AND WE NEED TO LEAVE THE ISLAND. I REPEAT, TERMINATE YOUR ONGOING OPERATIONS AND RETURN TO THE NEAREST BASE AND GET READY FOR EVACUATION.

BAZA TO ALL UNITS, OUR ATTACK ON MONTIGNAC HAS BEEN REPELLED. THE ENEMY IS LANDING ON THE WESTERN SHORE AND HAS CUT OFF SOME OF OUR UNITS. GET TO THE NEAREST BASE AND HEAD TOWARDS SAINT PIERRE. THE PORT OF MORTON IS NOT SAFE, I REPEAT, THE PORT OF MORTON IS NOT SAFE, HEAD FOR SAINT PIERRE. BAZA OUT.
BAZA TO ALL UNITS, GENERAL RETREAT IS IN EFFECT. GET BACK TO OUR LINES AND GET TO SAINT PIERRE. BAZA OUT.
